snippet: AMES--Steven. The Board of Directors and Staff of the American Friends of the Israel Museum, Jerusalem mourn the death of our friend and Executive Committee member, Steven Ames. Steven served AFIM in myriad ways. We will miss him deeply and extend condolences to Ann and the entire family. Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Board co-chairs, AFIM Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM James Snyder, Anne and Jerome Fisher Dir., IMJ Leah Siegel, Exec Dir., AFIM 1/3
lead_paragraph: AMES--Steven. The Board of Directors and Staff of the American Friends of the Israel Museum, Jerusalem mourn the death of our friend and Executive Committee member, Steven Ames. Steven served AFIM in myriad ways. We will miss him deeply and extend condolences to Ann and the entire family. Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Board co-chairs, AFIM Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM James Snyder, Anne and Jerome Fisher Dir., IMJ Leah Siegel, Exec Dir., AFIM 1/3
